MenueSystem

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • MenueSystem.Panel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Label, Menue

    public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a panel which draws maintains a simple background image and can also contain a series of sub panels with this one Note this panel does not force any of the sub panels to actually reside inside this panel. It is there resposiblility to stay inside this panels boundaries if they choose too
    Author:
    Michael Letter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Panel.PanelState
      Used to mark what operating mode this panel is in IDLE: all Sub panels are updated normally.

      • setState

        public void setState(Panel.PanelState newState,
                     boolean setSubPanels)
        will set the currentState of the Panel to the given PanelState IDLE: all Sub panels are updated normally. SELECTED: all Sub panels are updated normally. INACTIVE: Sub Panels are not updated.
        Parameters:
        newState - the desired State
        setSubPanels - if True all SupPanels of this Panel will also be set to the given state in addition to this Panel. otherwise only this Panel is affected

      • getState

        public Panel.PanelState getState()
        Will return the current state of the panel. IDLE: all Sub panels are updated normally. SELECTED: all Sub panels are updated normally. INACTIVE: Sub Panels are not updated.
        Returns:
        current state of the panel.

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String imageLocation)
        Will set the image that is currently be used for the panels draw
        Parameters:
        imageLocation - the location of the desired image

        public Vector2 getBackgroundCenter()
        Will return the center of the panel
        Returns:
        the center position of the panel.

      • getBackgroundSize

        public Vector2 getBackgroundSize()
        The current Width and height of the of the panel
        Returns:
        x=width, y=height of the panel.

      • getBackgroundColor

        public java.awt.Color getBackgroundColor()
        the current color used by the panel if no image isin use
        Returns:
        color of the background.

        public boolean setBackgroundColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Will set the color of the Panel to the given color
        Parameters:
        color - new color to be changed to.
        Returns:
        if TRUE: the change was successful, if FALSE no changes were made

      • getBackGroundVisibility

        public boolean getBackGroundVisibility()
        Will return whether or not the background is currenrly Visible
        Returns:
        if TRUE, background is visible, if False, background is invisible

      • setBackgroundVisiblility

        public void setBackgroundVisiblility(boolean visible)
        Will set whether or not the background is visible
        Parameters:
        visible - If TRUE, this background will be made visible. If FALSE, this background will be made invisible

      • getHostPanel

        public Panel getHostPanel()
        If this Panel is another Panel's subPanel this function will return that panel
        Returns:
        this SubPanels rootPanel

      • getID

        public int getID()
        If this Panel is another Panel's subPanel this function will return the int ID that can be used to access this panel from the hostPanel
        Returns:
        this Panels ID from the HostPanel, not if this ID is negative then this Panel is not any Panels subPanel and has no ID

      • getPanelDepth

        public int getPanelDepth()
        Will return how many Panels this panel is a SubPanel too
        Returns:
        how many Panels this panel is a SubPanel too

        Returns:

      • setVisibility

        public void setVisibility(boolean visible,
                          boolean effectSubPanels)
        Will set whether or not this Panel is Visible
        Parameters:
        visible - If TRUE, this panel will be made visible. If FALSE, this panel will be made invisible
        effectSubPanels - If TRUE, all of this panels subPanels visibility settings will be set to match this Panels visibility settings. If FALSE, only this panels visibility setting will be affcted

      • movePanel

        public void movePanel(Vector2 move,
                      boolean effectSubPanels)
        Will scale this panel by the given amount in world coordinates
        Parameters:
        move - the amount that this panel will be moved by
        effectSubPanels - If TRUE, all of this panels subPanels position settings will be set to match this Panels position settings.

      • scalePanel

        public void scalePanel(Vector2 scale,
                       boolean effectSubPanels)
        Will scale this panel by the given amount in world coordinates
        Parameters:
        scale - the amount that will be scaled by
        effectSubPanels - If TRUE, all of this panels subPanels size settings will be set to match this Panels size settings.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Will set this panel and all of its subPanels to be not be drawn nor updated automatically

      • addPanel

        public int addPanel(Panel newSubPanel)
        Will make a given panel a subPanel of this panel and update note this panel can not be in any other Panels at this point other wise the add will fail use remove panel to remove it if necessary
        Parameters:
        newSubPanel - the new subpanel to be added to this panel.
        Returns:
        If positive number represents that the int ID the newSubPanel can be referenced by from this Panel If negative then the add was unsuccessful and No changes were made

      • removePanel

        public boolean removePanel()
        Will attempt to remove the given Panel and all of its sub Panels from whatever tree it is currently part of
        Returns:
        if TRUE: removeTarget was removed successfully, if FALSE: removeTarget was not removed and no changes were made

      • removePanel

        public boolean removePanel(Panel removeTarget)
        Will attempt to remove the given Panel and all of its sub Panels from this Tree
        Parameters:
        removeTarget - the target Panel to be removed
        Returns:
        if TRUE: removeTarget was removed successfully, if FALSE: removeTarget was not removed and no changes were made

      • removePanel

        public boolean removePanel(int targetPanelLocation)
        Will attempt to remove the given Panel and all of its sub Panels from this Tree
        Parameters:
        targetPanelLocation - the location of the target Panel relative to this Panel
        Returns:
        if TRUE: removeTarget was removed successfully, if FALSE: removeTarget was not removed and no changes were made

      • getPanel

        public Panel getPanel(int targetID)
        Will attempt to find the given panel under this panel
        Parameters:
        targetID - the location of the Panel under this Panel relative to this Panel
        Returns:
        if null no Panel was found at this location other wise returns a pointer to the Panel at this location
